iti47:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti47:2.1: “Meditate wakeful, mendicants, mindful and aware, joyful and clear, and at times discern the skillful qualities in that state.
iti47:2.2: A mendicant who meditates in this way can expect one of two results:
iti47:2.3: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
